title: Is James Come "best friends " with Robert Muller, and is this friendship a conflict of interest?
subtitle: Comi's lawyer said that the two men knew each other from working together but barely "friends close," and the experts told us that the relationship did not meet the legal criteria for conflict of interest.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation (James Comy) and Special Adviser (Bob Muller) are "best friends," representing a conflict of interest in the Russian investigation.
